directions: Adjust oven rack to lowest position and heat oven to 450 degrees. Toss potatoes with oil, salt and pepper. Arrange, cut side down, on a large lipped cookie sheet or jellyroll pan.
Roast until tender and golden brown, about 30 minutes (check after 20 minutes). Transfer to a serving dish.
ingredients: 3 pounds small red new potatoes, halved
1 teaspoon Salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Roasted New Red Potatoes
